name: lode-vanilla
description: A large assortment of interface building blocks made using Sass and plain JavaScript.

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: npm run compile:css && npm run minify:css
scripts.build:js: npm run compile:js && npm run minify:js
scripts.compile: npm run compile:css && npm run compile:js
scripts.minify: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
